short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract and save tweets to CreatorBuddy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the extension built for Creator Buddy. It will allow you to extract your content history from X and also bookmark content from other accounts so you can review and repurpose in your Inspiration section.

A Creator Buddy account is required to use this extension.
